text: Ivo Oswald Mahlknecht (21 May 1939 – 31 March 2020) was an Italian alpine skier. He competed at the 1964 and 1968 Winter Olympics in the downhill, slalom and giant slalom events. He was born in Urtijëi. On 31 March 2020, Mahlknecht died in Brixen at the age of 80. ==References== ==Other websites== *Ivo Mahlknecht at Sports-Reference.com Category:1939 births Category:2020 deaths Category:1964 Winter Olympics Category:1968 Winter Olympics Category:Olympians for Italy Category:Italian skiers Category:People from Trentino-Alto Adige/Südtirol
title: Ivo Mahlknecht
